title: rename hook complaining about non-unique key (postgres)
body:
### expected behaviour
no errors

### actual behaviour
errors about non-unique keys.

### steps to reproduce
1. rename anything
2. look at log
3. 

### server configuration
operating system:
opensuse
web server: 
nginx 1.3.14
database:
postgresql
php version:
5.3.22
owncloud version:
master

### logs
#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
{"app":"hook","message":"error while running hook (\\oc\\files\\cache\\updater::renamehook): sqlstate[23505]: unique violation: 7 fehler:  doppelter schl\u00fcsselwert verletzt unique-constraint \u00bbfs_storage_path_hash\u00ab\ndetail:  schl\u00fcssel \u00bb(storage, path_hash)=(1, 0c2fc4fa1fa086a2203e808ba18a38a3)\u00ab existiert bereits.","level":3,"time":1363731781}
{"app":"hook","message":"error while running hook (\\oc\\files\\cache\\updater::renamehook): sqlstate[23505]: unique violation: 7 fehler:  doppelter schl\u00fcsselwert verletzt unique-constraint \u00bbfs_storage_path_hash\u00ab\ndetail:  schl\u00fcssel \u00bb(storage, path_hash)=(1, 5bf4248a4a8b1afbef747158f7b65d80)\u00ab existiert bereits.","level":3,"time":1363781603}
{"app":"hook","message":"error while running hook (\\oc\\files\\cache\\updater::renamehook): sqlstate[23505]: unique violation: 7 fehler:  doppelter schl\u00fcsselwert verletzt unique-constraint \u00bbfs_storage_path_hash\u00ab\ndetail:  schl\u00fcssel \u00bb(storage, path_hash)=(1, 032f182552dc0b7e8f05769c93eaaf2d)\u00ab existiert bereits.","level":3,"time":1363781622}
```
